sentences.english: Hearn fastened the vine about his belt, and stepped out into the rapids.
sentences.chinese: 俟思把藤索在腰裏繫好，闖進激流。

sentences.english: The shoelace has relaxed , the place also should go to a nobody has finished being.
sentences.chinese: 鞋帶鬆了，也應走到沒人的地方繫好。

sentences.english: Especially in the United States, it's a law that you have to wear your seatbelt.
sentences.chinese: 尤其在美國，法律規定開車時必須繫好安全帶。

sentences.english: The key to success for Otis is team-work spirit.
sentences.chinese: 奧的斯的成敗繫於團隊精神。

sentences.english: Buckle up, it may harder for aliens to suck you out of your car.
sentences.chinese: 繫好安全帶，這樣外形人也更難把你從車子裏抓走。

sentences.english: He tied up the horse and went into the inn .
sentences.chinese: 他繫住馬，走進了小酒店。

sentences.english: Two greens again, ask your caddy for yardage.
sentences.chinese: 呢處又繫有兩個果嶺，要碼數清楚最好問球僮。

sentences.english: Don't forget belt up before you drive off.
sentences.chinese: 別忘了開車前繫好保險帶。

sentences.english: Please make sure your seatbelt is properly secured at all times during this flight.
sentences.chinese: 請在飛行期間都要繫好您的座位安全帶。

sentences.english: The ends of each fibre rope were tied casually to a chain on the carrier rear-fence.
sentences.chinese: 每條纖維繩的末端均隨意地繫於車斗尾板一條鏈子上。

sentences.english: When a plane begins to take off or land, its passengers should fasten their seat belt, too.
sentences.chinese: 當飛機開始起飛或降落的時候，乘客也應繫好安全帶。

sentences.english: It was a beautiful watch, on a long, thin, gold watchband .
sentences.chinese: 那是很美的手錶，繫着一條又長又薄的金錶帶。

sentences.english: It's much safer if you buckle up while driving.
sentences.chinese: 開車時繫好安全帶就會安全得多。

sentences.english: Forever more, I will be the jailor of the Damned.
sentences.chinese: 從今以還，我將羈繫這咒罵之力。

sentences.english: All travelers are advised to fasten their safety-belt to avoid being injured.
sentences.chinese: 請旅客們繫好安全帶，以防碰傷。

sentences.english: The original lucky star big market, packed with the latest version of the software trade.
sentences.chinese: 原版的大福星行情繫統，打包了最新版的交易軟件。
